topic.title: The structure of an SGML-based dictionary

body.p:
An SGML-based dictionary is divided into the following:
A header section containing general dictionary information such as source language, target language(s), and creation date.
A maptable section specifying the structure of a dictionary entry. That is, all the entry fields that make up a dictionary entry and the relation between these entry fields.
An entry section with dictionary entries appearing one after another.
The dictionary is enclosed by a dictionary start tag <dict> and a dictionary end tag </dict>.
